DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : Alcohol metabolism change gastric bypass patient , lead fast resorption high alcohol peak concentration blood . Because strong alcohol effect gastric bypass suggest also general cognitive function stronger impair . Materials Methods : We include 28 female ( 12 gastric bypass patient , 8 obese 8 normal weight subject ) study . Each participant drink 250 ml white wine . Directly , 10-30 min 45-65 min wine consumption cognitive function test test battery attentional performance ( TAP ) Zimmermann Fimm . During whole examination breath-alcohol-contents ( BACs ) measure every 5 minute breathalyser `` Dräger Alcotest 7510 '' .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Moderate Alcohol Consumption Cognitive Functioning After Roux-en Y Gastric Bypass
DOC.criteria: Gastric bypass group : woman preOP BMI > 35 kg/m² time since bariatric surgery > 1 year age 1860 year moderate drinking habit obese group : woman BMI > 35 kg/m² age 1860 year moderate drinking habit normal weight group : woman BMI 18.5 25 kg/m² age 1860 year moderate drinking habit men patient drink wine usage psychotropic drug alcoholic pregnancy
